price: (17) They used to sleep but little of the night,[1538]
arabic: كَانُواْ قَلِيلٗا مِّنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ مَا يَهۡجَعُونَ
footnotes: [1538]- i.e., spending a portion of the night in prayer and supplication.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: kānū qalīlan mina al-layli mā yahjaʿūna
